verses.roman:
rājā dekhi' mahāprabhu karena dhikkāra
chi, chi, viṣayīra sparśa ha-ila āmāra

synonyms: rājā dekhi'-by seeing the King; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena—does; dhik-kāra—condemnation; chi chi—how pitiable it is; viṣayīra—of a person interested in mundane affairs; sparśa ha-ila—there has been touching; āmāra—of Me.
translation: After seeing the King, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu condemned Himself, saying, "Oh, how pitiful it is that I have touched a person who is interested in mundane affairs."
